title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Adobe & Salesforce enable sustainability initiatives with AWS CCFT (AIM332)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Adobe 和 Salesforce 如何通过 AWS CCFT 推动可持续发展倡议 (AIM332)
abstract: Learn how your organization can gain deeper environmental insights using AWS's Customer Carbon Footprint Tool, illustrated through success stories from Adobe and Salesforce. You'll see how these companies are advancing their sustainability reporting and uncovering valuable carbon metrics across their cloud operations. This session showcases how to access, understand, and utilize comprehensive environmental data to inform your sustainability decisions. Discover how AWS tools enable organizations to track their progress and measure impact. Experience how enhanced visibility into carbon footprint data can transform your organization's approach to environmental responsibility and drive meaningful change.
abstract_cn: 了解您的组织如何使用AWS客户碳足迹工具获得更深入的环境洞察，通过Adobe和Salesforce的成功案例进行说明。您将看到这些公司如何推进其可持续性报告并发现其云运营中有价值的碳指标。本次会议展示了如何访问、理解和利用全面的环境数据来为您的可持续性决策提供信息。了解AWS工具如何使组织能够跟踪其进展并衡量影响。体验碳足迹数据的增强可见性如何改变您组织的环境责任方法并推动有意义的变化。

presenter.name: Alexis Bateman (Sus)
presenter.title: Head of AWS Sustainability Tech & Operations
